name: Hoodie Kid
description: "HOODIE KID" (Dev Build #1 02/16) I'm just posting the progress I've made in this little test game I've been working on (uwu). This game is pretty much just me testing out voxel-esque stuff! Either press the picture or click here to download and check it out! Atm I've only tested it on Windows 7 so I can't guarantee it'll work on other platforms (9=0=)9! I may upload a web version later but for now we have a download !
